summary: Being born and raised in a creating nation like Bangladesh, where clothing is the leading industry, I have always been fascinated by this part of the economy. Since graduating with a degree in apparel technology and professional involvement in the sector, my fascination with textiles has grown further. I decided to engage more thoroughly in the industry and learn more about technological advancements and new investments worldwide. It was when I started my master's in innovative textile development in the Netherlands. As someone who emphasizes social and environmental responsibilities, I want to contribute more to sustainability in this field, and It's what I want to devote more time and effort to explore.
